body:
Hey Avicus <3
So, I'm my religion today is starting a new year :D
Every new year, we must like say sorry about all the things we did in this year for this year will be better than one before, by learning from mistakes.
So, year ago I bought a game for new year called minecraft.
then I found the multiplayer, then Avicus, then I met you, the people who make my bad days good.
I was stupid nub, who didn't give good back to you.
i know I've insulted so much people, now I'm really sorry, hoping for happy new year of peace, fun and good time.
happy new year guys, let's keep having good time c: :) :D <3

title: Happy new year.

replies.body: Happy new year Eric, set a goal for this year and aim for it! =D
replies.body_tagged: Happy new year Eric, set a goal for this year and aim for it! =D

replies.body: You guys can't really understand how I'm happy you really mean for it, I couldn't believe minecraft will be the place when I will find so much great friends like you, happy new year <3
replies.body_tagged: You guys can't really understand how I'm happy you really mean for it, I couldn't believe minecraft will be the place when I will find so much great friends like you, happy new year <3

replies.body: My friend is Jewish too. She missed school to celebrate! Happy New  Year!

replies.body: Happy new year my friend! When I first joined Avicus you and me didn't really connect that well, it's all the past now and sorted out, I do think you are a very good person even though you do mistakes sometimes. We all do mistakes.
replies.body_tagged: Happy new year my friend! When I first joined Avicus you and me didn't really connect that well, it's all the past now and sorted out, I do think you are a very good person even though you do mistakes sometimes. We all do mistakes.

replies.body: Happy new year Eric and everyone else :D i am not jewish but i can still wish you guys a happy new year with a lot of good times. :D

Happy rosh hashannah.
and have a great holiday.

replies.body:
My school is like 70% Jewish, so I'm off today and tomorrow (even though I have a very different religious belief).

Anyways, I'll be respectful and say,
Happy Holidays :)
